alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Emanuel, northwestern Treutlen and southeastern Johnson Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Adrian, or 12 miles north of Soperton, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Adrian, Norristown Junction, Covena, Meeks, Orianna, Blackville, Norristown and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
